content.rendered:
Terms and Conditions

BoxSafe Terms and Conditions

BoxSafe Terms and Conditions

Disclaimer

Please note that all BoxSafe certifications expire at the end of each calendar year, specifically on December 31st. This expiration ensures that all officials and trainers are held accountable to the most current standards in boxing safety, rules, and officiating procedures. Failure to renew your certification by January 1st of the following year will result in the immediate suspension of your certification and official status within BoxSafe programs, including but not limited to, officiating, coaching, and working in any certified role.

By renewing your certification, you commit to staying informed and trained on the most recent developments, updates, and safety practices that have emerged throughout the year. This renewal process is crucial for maintaining the integrity and safety of the sport, as well as ensuring that all officials continue to operate at the highest level of competency. Officials will not be permitted to participate in any events or roles until the renewal process is completed, and their certification status is restored.

Conditions of Use

By accessing and using this website, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to comply with the terms outlined in this Agreement. BoxSafe reserves the right to modify these terms at any time, and continued use of the website signifies your acceptance of any updated or revised terms.

We provide our website and services exclusively to those who agree to these terms. If you do not accept these conditions, you should cease using the website immediately. BoxSafe Training and Officiating, its products, and its services are only accessible to users who fully accept these terms, and BoxSafe reserves the right to deny access to users who violate or fail to comply with the Agreement.

Privacy Policy

Before proceeding with the use of our website, we strongly recommend reviewing our Privacy Policy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. Understanding this policy is essential for users to be fully aware of how their data will be handled, as well as their rights regarding personal information. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy, and this policy outlines the measures in place to ensure your data is handled responsibly and transparently.

Age Restriction

Use of this website is restricted to individuals who are at least 18 years of age. By using this website, you affirm that you are 18 years or older, and you can legally adhere to the terms and conditions laid out in this Agreement. If you are found to have misrepresented your age, BoxSafe will not be held responsible for any resulting legal or financial consequences.

BoxSafe requires all users to be of legal age due to the nature of the services offered, including certifications and official programs related to boxing. We take age-related responsibilities seriously, and we will take necessary actions against accounts that provide false information regarding age, which could include account termination and restriction from services.

Intellectual Property

All content, materials, products, and services available on this website are the exclusive property of BoxSafe Training and Officiating, its affiliates, and partners. This includes, but is not limited to, trademarks, trade secrets, copyrights, patents, branding elements, and other intellectual property. Unauthorized use or distribution of these materials is strictly prohibited.

You agree not to reproduce, copy, sell, resell, distribute, or exploit any part of our website or its services for any commercial purpose without explicit permission from BoxSafe. This includes but is not limited to digital reproduction, registration of new trademarks, or unauthorized use of our proprietary materials. Unauthorized usage could result in legal action against the offending party, and BoxSafe reserves the right to enforce its intellectual property rights to the fullest extent allowed by law.

When you upload or submit content to our website, you grant BoxSafe a non-exclusive, royalty-free, and transferable license to display, use, distribute, and reproduce your content. We encourage you to contact us immediately if you believe your intellectual property has been used without authorization, and we will make every effort to resolve the situation amicably.

User Accounts

Users may be required to create an account to access certain parts of the website, purchase products, or participate in services. When registering for an account, you agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information. Maintaining the confidentiality of your account details, including your password, is your responsibility, and any actions or activities carried out under your account will be deemed to be your responsibility.

In the event that you suspect unauthorized access to your account or any security breaches, you must notify us immediately so we can take action to safeguard your account. Failure to do so may result in further unauthorized activity under your account, for which BoxSafe will not be held responsible. We reserve the right to terminate accounts, restrict access, or modify content as necessary to protect our services and users.

Applicable Law

By using this website, you agree that the laws of the Australian Government will govern these terms and conditions, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any disputes or legal proceedings arising out of your use of the website or services will be subject to the jurisdiction of Australian courts. BoxSafe’s terms and conditions are designed to comply with Australian law, ensuring all parties’ rights are respected under applicable regulations.

Disputes

If a dispute arises between you and BoxSafe in relation to your use of the website or any products or services you have purchased, you agree to resolve it through arbitration or the Australian state or federal courts. By accepting these terms, you consent to the exclusive jurisdiction of these courts for the resolution of any disputes.

BoxSafe is committed to resolving disputes in a timely and fair manner, and we encourage users to contact us directly to address any issues before pursuing legal action. We will make reasonable efforts to settle disputes amicably and minimize the need for formal legal proceedings whenever possible.

Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold BoxSafe Training and Officiating, its affiliates, partners, employees, and contractors harmless from any claims, damages, or legal demands arising from your use or misuse of our website, services, or products. This includes but is not limited to legal fees, costs, and settlements that may arise from any third-party claims related to your breach of these terms or your violation of any applicable laws.

BoxSafe reserves the right to select its own legal counsel and control the defense of any such claims. You agree to cooperate fully with BoxSafe in defending against any legal claims and to reimburse BoxSafe for any expenses incurred as a result of your actions or inactions.

Limitation on Liability

BoxSafe Training and Officiating will not be held liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages that may result from your use or misuse of our website or services. This includes, but is not limited to, damages related to loss of profits, data, or business opportunities.

BoxSafe makes every effort to ensure that the information and services provided on our website are accurate and reliable; however, we do not guarantee that our website will be free from errors or interruptions, and we are not liable for any damages that may occur as a result of website downtime or technical issues. Users are responsible for backing up their own data and ensuring that they take necessary precautions when using the internet.

BoxSafe reserves the right to update, modify, or terminate this Agreement at any time without prior notice. Any changes to the Agreement will be communicated to users through email or updates on the website. By continuing to use the website after changes have been made, you agree to the updated terms. This Agreement supersedes any previous agreements between you and BoxSafe regarding the use of the website.

Still have any questions or concerns?

Please get in touch with our friendly and supportive team

Contact Us
